name: Honeycomb Creative Solutions
description:
Honeycomb Creative Solutions is a leading graphic design, web design and marketing firm - located in Metro Vancouver, British Columbia - that produces everything from annual reports and brochures to websites.
Honeycomb Creative is a design firm for growing companies that need strategic print, web and integrated marketing communications.
We bring an innate understanding of graphic design, website usability and a proven track record of delivering intuitive creative results to our clients.
